name: mancunian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person from Manchester, a city in the north of England

from or relating to Manchester, a city in the north of England: I may speak with a Mancunian accent, but I'm still 100 per cent Welsh and proud of it. He has a Manchester accent and a dry Mancunian wit.
More examplesFewer examplesAll the festival's headline live acts have turned out to be Mancunian.The album was first released on the Mancunian singer's independent label.Despite the notoriously rainy Mancunian weather, the building can create 181 megawatt-hours of renewable electricity each year.
